name: Corey Taylor
shortDescription: Corey Todd Taylor is an American musician, singer, and songwriter known for his work with Slipknot and Stone Sour.

name: Adele
shortDescription: Adele Laurie Blue Adkins is an English singer-songwriter known for her powerful voice and emotional ballads.

name: Kendrick Lamar
shortDescription: Kendrick Lamar Duckworth is an American rapper and songwriter known for his socially conscious lyrics.

name: Taylor Swift
shortDescription: Taylor Alison Swift is an American singer-songwriter known for her narrative songwriting.

name: Ed Sheeran
shortDescription: Ed Sheeran is an English singer-songwriter known for his melodic pop songs.

name: Beyoncé
shortDescription: Beyoncé Giselle Knowles-Carter is an American singer, songwriter, and actress.

name: John Legend
shortDescription: John Roger Stephens, known professionally as John Legend, is an American singer, songwriter, and pianist.

name: Billie Eilish
shortDescription: Billie Eilish Pirate Baird O'Connell is an American singer-songwriter known for her unique style and sound.
